articles.description: Amanda Kloots gives an update on her Broadway actor husband Nick Cordero's condition. We're "hoping for miracles every day," Kloots said.
articles.content:
Nick Cordero's wife, Amanda Kloots, said the Broadway actor had surgery to remove his right leg because of complications from coronavirus.

articles.title: Kate and William refuse to say if they will keep Charlotte home as schools reopen - Mirror Online
articles.description: Five-year-old Princess Charlotte is one of thousands of Year 1 children who will be expected back at school tomorrow. She attends St Thomas’s in south London where fees range from £5,145 to £7,262
articles.content:
The Duke and Duchess of Cambridge have refused to say whether they will defy the government by keeping Charlotte from returning to school with other Year 1 children.

articles.title: Herb Stempel, the whistleblower portrayed in 'Quiz Show,' dies at 93 - Entertainment Weekly
articles.description: As a contestant on NBC's Twenty-One in 1956, Stempel went public with the revelation that he was given the answers to questions.
articles.content:
Herb Stempel, the infamous Queens man who exposed how the NBC game show Twenty-One was built on lies and deceit, has died. He was 93.
